titles.title: Children's Security Act of 1994
To provide supplemental security income benefits to needy children.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H50-51)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 1/26/1994--Introduced. Children's Security Act of 1994 - Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act to make unmarried individuals under 18 eligible for SSI.
